About universAAL LDDI Suite

The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL Local Device Discovery and Integration

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL LDDI Bluetooth Suite The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL Local Discovery and Integration for bluetooth technology
universAAL LDDI Common Suite LDDI Common components
universAAL LDDI FS20 Suite Integration of FS20 components
universAAL LDDI KNX Suite Integration of KNX components
universAAL LDDI Suite (Config) The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL Local Device Discovery and Integration (Configuration)
universAAL LDDI ZigBee Suite Integration of ZigBee components
universAAL LDDI ZWave Suite Integration of KNX components
universAAL LDDI Eclipse Smarthome Integration Integration of Eclipse Smarthome components
universAAL LDDI Composite Artifact responsible for generating composite file of universAAL lddi
universAAL LDDI Karaf Feature The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL Local Device Discovery and Integration
